sysAssert.h File Reference

This component provides a Assert facility. The component provides application to register hooks that are invoked when Assert is encountered in execution. Application handler should log the diagnostic information and take corrective action. More...

#include <sysTypes.h>
#include <dbg.h>

Data Structures

struct  SYS_AssertParam_t

Defines

#define USE_WARN_ASSERTS
 A macro that maps SYS_E_ASSERT_WARN to its implementation when not defined SYS_E_ASSERT_WARN macro will not have any effect. This is not defined in release mode.
#define USE_ERROR_ASSERTS
 A macro that maps SYS_E_ASSERT_ERROR to its implementation when not defined SYS_E_ASSERT_ERROR macro will not have any effect.
#define USE_FATAL_ASSERTS
 A macro that maps SYS_E_ASSERT_FATAL to its implementation when not defined SYS_E_ASSERT_FATAL macro will not have any effect.
#define USE_DBGCODE
 A macro that is used to populate and pass dbgCode associated with current occurance to assert callback handler registerd by application (if any)
#define INVOKE_CALLBACK_WARN()   SYS_DefAssertCallbackWarn();
 A macro that is used to control if callback should be invoked for WARN_LEVEL asserts.
#define INVOKE_CALLBACK_ERROR()   SYS_DefAssertCallbackError();
 A macro that is used to control if callback should be invoked for ERROR_LEVEL asserts.
#define INVOKE_CALLBACK_FATAL()   SYS_DefAssertCallbackFatal();
 A macro that is used to control if callback should be invoked for FATAL_LEVEL asserts.
#define WARN_LEVEL   1
#define ERROR_LEVEL   2
#define FATAL_LEVEL   3
#define LOG(dbgCode, file, line)
#define POPULATE_DBGCODE(MDbgCode)   gAssertDbgCode = MDbgCode;
#define POPULATE_COMPID()
#define POPULATE_FILE()
#define POPULATE_LINE()
#define SYS_E_ASSERT_WARN(condition, MDbgCode)
 SYS_E_ASSERT_WARN MACRO.
#define SYS_E_ASSERT_ERROR(condition, MDbgCode)
 SYS_E_ASSERT_ERROR MACRO.

void SYS_DefAssertCallbackWarn ()
 SYS_DefAssertCallbackWarn callback called on WARN LEVEL ASSERTS if enabled, This function invokes registered callback.
void SYS_DefAssertCallbackError (void)
 SYS_DefAssertCallbackError callback invoked on ERROR LEVEL ASSERTS if enabled.

SYS_AssertCallback_t s_pAssertSubscriber

Detailed Description

This component provides a Assert facility. The component provides application to register hooks that are invoked when Assert is encountered in execution. Application handler should log the diagnostic information and take corrective action.

Author:
Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com

Define Documentation

#define USE_DBGCODE

A macro that is used to populate and pass dbgCode associated with current occurance to assert callback handler registerd by application (if any)

Information to populate for callback handler (have size impact for each)

Assert levels.

Definition at line 134 of file sysAssert.h.

#define SYS_E_ASSERT_WARN (   condition,
  MDbgCode 
)
Value:
if (0 == (condition) ) \
    { \
      POPULATE_DBGCODE(MDbgCode)   \
      POPULATE_COMPID()            \
      POPULATE_LINE()              \
      POPULATE_FILE()              \
      INVOKE_CALLBACK_WARN()       \
    }

SYS_E_ASSERT_WARN MACRO.

Parameters:
conditionboolean value or expression evaluating to boolean value
MDbgCodeEncoded dbgCode

Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* SYS_AssertCallback_t)(SYS_AssertParam_t *)

Callback function type. Called when assert occurs in code flow

Parameters:
SYS_AssertParam_t* pointer to SYS_AssertParam_t structure

Definition at line 279 of file sysAssert.h.

Function Documentation

void SYS_AssertSubscribe ( SYS_AssertCallback_t  pCallback)

Subscribe callback, callback will be called when a assert occurs. Only one subscriber is allowed.

void SYS_DefAssertCallbackWarn ( )

SYS_DefAssertCallbackWarn callback called on WARN LEVEL ASSERTS if enabled, This function invokes registered callback.

Returns:
None
